title: Frequently Asked Questions
intro: Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions about MyHome24App.

questions.question: How does MyHome24App work?
questions.answer: MyHome24App is an online platform where you can buy, rent or sell properties. You can browse listings, add your own properties, and communicate directly with owners or agents.

questions.question: How can I add a property?
questions.answer: Log in, go to your user dashboard and click 'Add New Listing'. Fill out the form with the property details and publish it.

questions.question: Is the platform free to use?
questions.answer: Basic features like registration, search and creating listings are free. For extra visibility, we offer paid premium advertising options.

questions.question: Can I contact the owner directly?
questions.answer: Yes, each listing provides a contact form or direct contact information if made public by the owner.

questions.question: How does verification work?
questions.answer: After registration, you will receive an email with a verification link. Only after confirming your email will you be able to use all features.

questions.question: How can I reset my password?
questions.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password?' on the login page and follow the instructions. You will receive an email with a reset link.
